content: this is a summary of a legal case in the district court in ljubljana the case started on april 11 2019 and concluded on october 2 2020 lasting for a total of 1 year 5 months and 21 days the case involved the payment of costs and the responsible party is being compensated the final resolution of the case includes the division of goods between two exspouses with a total value of 21000 eur the plaintiff will receive 37000 eur from the defendant and will also keep the goods the decision was based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement in this case is confidential and there is no available translation for the document
